title: TPACK-Based Technology Integration Design for Higher Education Science Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational science knowledge and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: A blended-format graduate-level science program where students engage in online/offline learning activities using personal devices. Project-based assessments evaluate real-world problem-solving skills.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the interactions among the three core domains of the TPACK framework: technology, content, and pedagogy.
Learners can propose two or more lesson designs that effectively integrate technology in science classes.
Learners can diagnose the current status of technology use in educational settings by analyzing survey results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
